hints.label: thm-alpha-net-explicit
hints.title: Mean-Field Convergence Rate (Explicit)
hints.content:
285: :label: thm-alpha-net-explicit
286: 
287: The mean-field convergence rate as a function of simulation parameters is:
288: 
289: $$
290: \begin{aligned}
291: \alpha_{\text{net}}(\tau, \gamma, \sigma, \lambda_{\text{revive}}, \kappa_{\max}, L_U) \approx \frac{1}{2} \Bigg[
292: &\frac{\gamma \sigma^2}{1 + \gamma/\lambda_{\min} + \lambda_{\text{revive}}/(M_\infty \gamma)} \\
293: &- \frac{2\gamma}{\sigma^2} \left(\sqrt{\frac{\kappa_{\max}}{\sigma^2}} + \sqrt{\frac{L_U}{\gamma}} + \gamma\right) \sigma\tau\sqrt{2d} \\
294: &- \frac{2\gamma L_U^3}{\sigma^4(1 + \gamma/\lambda_{\min})} \\
295: &- (C_{\nabla x} + \gamma) \sqrt{2d\sigma^2/\gamma} \\
296: &- 2\kappa_{\max} - \frac{\kappa_0(\lambda_{\text{revive}} + \kappa_0)^2}{\lambda_{\text{revive}}^2}
297: \Bigg]
298: \end{aligned}

hints.label: thm-optimal-parameter-scaling
hints.title: Optimal Parameter Scaling
hints.content:
369: :label: thm-optimal-parameter-scaling
370: 
371: For a landscape with Lipschitz constant $L_U$ and minimum Hessian eigenvalue $\lambda_{\min}$, the optimal parameter scaling is:
372: 
373: $$
374: \begin{aligned}
375: \gamma^* &\sim L_U^{3/7} \\
376: \sigma^* &\sim L_U^{9/14} \\
377: \tau^* &\sim L_U^{-12/7} \\
378: \lambda_{\text{revive}}^* &\sim \kappa_{\max}
379: \end{aligned}
380: $$
381: 
382: yielding convergence rate:
383: 
384: $$
385: \alpha_{\text{net}}^* \sim \gamma^* \sim L_U^{3/7}
hints.raw_directive:
